content.heading: Order Placement
content.text: Upon placing an order, you will receive a confirmation email with your order details. Our team will verify the payment and inventory.

content.heading: Processing Time
content.text: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days. During peak seasons or sale periods, processing may take up to 3-4 business days.

content.heading: Shipping & Delivery
content.text: We partner with trusted courier services to ensure timely delivery. Standard delivery takes 5-7 business days across India. You will receive a tracking link via email/SMS once your order is dispatched.

content.heading: International Shipping
content.text: Currently, we only ship within India. International shipping will be coming soon.

content.heading: Data Collection
content.text: We collect personal information such as your name, email, phone number, and shipping address when you place an order or sign up for our newsletter.

content.heading: Usage of Information
content.text: Your data is used solely for processing orders, improving our services, and communicating with you regarding your purchases. We do not sell your data to third parties.

content.heading: Payment Security
content.text: All payments are processed through secure gateways (Razorpay). We do not store your card details or banking information.

content.heading: Cookies
content.text: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze site traffic.

content.heading: How do I track my order?
content.text: You can track your order status in the 'My Orders' section. Once shipped, a tracking link will also be sent to your email.

content.heading: Can I cancel my order?
content.text: Orders can be cancelled only before they are dispatched. If the order has already been shipped, it cannot be cancelled.

content.heading: What is the return policy?
content.text: We accept returns for damaged or incorrect items within 7 days of delivery. Please contact our support team with unboxing video/images for assistance.

content.heading: Do you offer customization?
content.text: Yes, we offer customization on select products. Please check the product description or contact us for more details.
